text: [CHEERING AND APPLAUSE]
Hi.

My name is Kasey, and
we are team Nom Pot.

The fundamental problem
that we're trying to solve

is a trade-off in eating
options between eating healthy
and eating conveniently.

Today, you are forced
to choose convenience.

You are microwaving frozen meals
from Trader Joe's, ordering in

from Door Dash, or
going to Chipotle.

You shouldn't have
to sacrifice health.

You deserve to eat a healthy,
home cooked meal any day

of the week, regardless
of your busy schedule.
Introducing Nom Pot.

Nom Pot is a line of frozen,
healthy, one pot meals that

combines the convenience of
frozen with the health of home
cooked.

We start with healthy,
raw ingredients.

Take care of all the prep
so you don't have to.

Put everything in
a freezer, so you

can just take it out when
it's most convenient for you,

and you will have
a healthy meal that

is cooked for the very
first time in your home.

Just toss everything into
one pot and let it simmer.

We are already selling
in Boston today.

And when you place an order,
our team gets to work.
Hi.
I'm Zach.

And I'll cut up your
onions and your carrots.
[LAUGHING]
I'm Neha.

I'll package your turkey
chili and your chicken pho.
I'm Ed.

I've been banned from
being in the kitchen,

but I'll deliver your Nom
Pot straight to your door.
[LAUGHING AND CHEERING]

In the future, we will be in the
Whole Foods and Trader Joe's.

But today, you can order online
right now at nompotmeals.com.
Check us out.
Thank you.
